* Mask the same way the non-evip are masked
 * Trigger the same GA tracking events

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.summary: Make an ASAN variant, and reduce the batch time of the Valgrind variant

fields.summary: Make an ASAN variant, and reduce the batch time of the Valgrind variant

comments.body: Valid bug - because eVIP gets indexed by Google, we need to mask it too

[~homer] If we need mask phone and email, do we support the function "unmask", which is click on the masked phone and email would show the real phone and email?
If we support unmask function, do we also need to support the tracking when click unmask phone and email?

[~homer] Attention that description in eVIP / related ads are plain text instead of rich text. If we want to mask and keep it as plain text, it means user will not actually try to do unmask for them (personally I think it's OK). And making mask part rich text needs extra effort because we need to consider about:
1. The ellipse part when mask part is at the end of cut description.
2. How to avoid user go to linked VIP by mistake when clicking on mask because all the places other than mask part means going to linked VIP. This is especially important on mobile phone.

QA Handoff note:

Branch name:Â ULIVZ-32510-mask-phone-and-email

Affected pages: EVIP

Local dev test:
1. Phone / Email is masked in EVIP content
2. GA event is triggered when clicking on mask.

There is still an issue about this function.
 # Open an expired ad's VIP, in the description, click "***Mostrar email***"
 # Login using the ad's account
 # Go to myads page, the "CONSULTAS TEL/EMAIL" value should be 1, but now it is 0
Fixed in branch. Waiting for pipeline.

items.toString:
* Mask the same way the non-evip are masked
 * Trigger the same GA tracking events
